title: Jim Cramer: The Democrats Debate, and the Future of Corporations
text:
There's the stock market and then there's the politiciansAs I speak to the executives of major corporations that have reported I am blown away about how well the companies are doingI am talking about managed care, banking, airlines, and drugsBut if Elizabeth Warren or Bernie Sanders gets the nomination then I can tell you that you would be hard-pr...

description: I thought last night's debate was pretty frightening when it comes to managed care, banking, airlines, and drugs.
authors: I Thought Last Night'S Debate Was Pretty Frightening When It Comes To Managed Care
